title: WTB:  t206 Kleinow Catching PSA 3 or Better
author: Qiot

posts.post_title: WTB:  t206 Kleinow Catching PSA 3 or Better
posts.post_content:
I'm looking to purchase a replacement for my Kleinow (catching) in my t206 Red Sox set.

I wouldn't mind going up in grade but my Kleinow is the only one with a crease, the rest of my team displays beautifully. I have a PSA 3 (with a crease) so I don't want to go the other direction.

Thank you for your consideration.

Hi L@nc3.

I have an SGC 50 Kleinow, Boston, with the tough SC 460/25 back.
You can see it here:

[url]https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=291006[/url]

Email djdoremus@msn. com if interested; thanks.

Doug
Bump.  Still looking.  Kleinow Catching PSA 3 or better, no creases!  Thank you.
Bump it up.  Still need one of these.  Thank you!
